verses.name: Judges 6:15
verses.text: And he said unto him, Oh my Lord, wherewith shall I save Israel? behold, my family is poor in Manasseh, and I am the least in my father’s house.

verses.name: Judges 6:16
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, Surely I will be with thee, and thou shalt smite the Midianites as one man.

verses.name: Judges 6:17
verses.text: And he said unto him, If now I have found grace in thy sight, then shew me a sign that thou talkest with me.
